name: International Congress on Agriculture, Food, and Nutrition 2025
content: The International Congress on Agriculture, Food, and Nutrition 2025 (CAFN 2025) will be held during Jan 9th-11th, 2025 in Macau, China with offline plus online format. CAFN 2025 includes plenary forum, 15 breakout sessions, as well as poster exhibition in the three-day scientific program. The topics will focus on Agricultural Biotechnology, Nutrition and Metabolism, Food Analytical Technologies, Food Safety and Security, Bioactive Ingredients, etc. We look forward your participation, and if you have any questions, please contact Lucy through the email cafn@lmsii.org
organizers: Life and Medical Sciences Innovation Institute (LMSII)
